metadata.title: MeLi Trends - MercadoLibre Trends in Real Time
metadata.description: Discover the 50 most searched and sold products on MercadoLibre. Trends updated weekly for Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Uruguay and Peru.

trends.title: Trends
trends.noTrendsAvailable: No trends available at this time

overview.categoryAnalysisDesc: Category view with product type analysis

about.pageDescription: MercadoLibre Trends show the 50 most popular products among users. This information is updated weekly and is available for 7 Latin American countries. Trends are automatically classified into 3 types based on their position, and you can filter them by category to find specific opportunities.

threeTypes.title: Three Types of Trends (Automatic Classification)
threeTypes.description: The 50 trends are automatically classified according to their position in the API response. Each trend card shows a {badge} indicating its type:

fastestGrowing.title: Fastest-Growing
fastestGrowing.description: Products with the {highlight} in the last week.

mostWanted.title: Most Wanted
mostWanted.description: Products with the {highlight} during the last week.

mostPopular.title: Most Popular
mostPopular.description: Products with the {highlight} compared to 2 weeks ago.

businessStrategy.title: Business Strategy
businessStrategy.question: What's the best approach for a successful business?

recommended.title: Recommended Strategy: Combine Metrics
recommended.point1: {label} ‚Üí To know what's "hot" right now (high demand)
recommended.point2: {label} ‚Üí To validate that it actually sells (not just searched)

searchVsConversion.title: Search Volume vs. Conversion
searchVsConversion.description: Products with {highlight} (e.g., "iphone 15 pro max 256gb") convert better than generic searches (e.g., "phone"). Look for specific keywords within trends for better results.

categories.title: Filter by Categories
categories.available: Now available! You can filter trends by specific category using the dropdown at the top of any trends view. This allows you to focus on specific niches and find less competitive opportunities.
categories.exampleTitle: Example of popular categories in Argentina:

tip.title: Tip: Combine categories with trend types
tip.description: For example, filter by "Cell Phones" and look for products in the {fastest} section (top 10) to find phones that are selling well. Or look in {popular} (last 20) to identify emerging trends in that category.

updateFrequency.question: How often are trends updated?
updateFrequency.answer: Trends are updated {frequency} by MercadoLibre. Our application shows the most recent data available in the official API.

publicData.question: Are trends public or private data?
publicData.answer: Trends are {type} from MercadoLibre. They show the same popular products for all users, they are not personalized and do not require user login.

difference.question: What's the difference between "most wanted" and "most sold"?
difference.mostWanted: {label} - Reflects search volume, what people are looking for
difference.fastestGrowing: {label} - Reflects revenue growth, what's actually being bought
difference.conclusion: A product can have many searches but few sales, or vice versa.

business.question: How can I use this information for my business?
business.point1: Identify products with high demand in your country/category
business.point2: Discover emerging trends before your competition
business.point3: Validate product ideas by seeing if they have real traction (sales)
business.point4: Optimize your inventory based on real demand
business.point5: Find specific niches with less competition using categories

apiSource.question: Where does this data come from?
apiSource.answer: All data comes from the {link}. Authentication is handled securely on our server, without exposing credentials.

apiStatus.title: Search API Status
apiStatus.description: MercadoLibre has restricted access to its Search API through CloudFront, blocking all requests with 403 errors. This issue affects developers worldwide since {date}.
apiStatus.contacted: We have contacted MercadoLibre to resolve the issue
apiStatus.note: In the meantime, you can view basic trends on the main page. We will notify you when the functionality is restored.

enrichment.title: Enrichment Functionality (temporarily unavailable)
enrichment.description: The enriched trends view quickly loads basic trends. To see detailed metrics (business opportunity, prices, sales), click the {button} button on each card when the functionality becomes available.
enrichment.opportunityScore: {label} - Score 0-100 based on search volume, sales, free shipping and availability
enrichment.priceRange: {label} - Minimum, maximum and average price of top products
enrichment.totalSold: {label} - Sum of units sold of main products
enrichment.freeShipping: {label} - Percentage of products with free shipping
enrichment.note: Metrics are loaded on demand to avoid API blocks.

about.footer: This application was created to visualize public MercadoLibre trends.
about.disclaimer: It is not affiliated with or officially endorsed by MercadoLibre.
